programme.title: Hell's Kitchen S24
programme.desc: The final four Chefs are faced with their toughest challenges yet. First Hell’s Kitchen Grocery Games with a surprise twist and for dinner it’s sabotage night!

programme.title: Sandokan: The Pirate Prince
programme.desc: Sandokan helps fight off a raid by the Sultan’s men, but is captured when Lang betrays him. Marianne, back in civilized life and courted by Brooke, struggles with doubts about what Sandokan told her, breaking down as the Sultan parades the tortured pirate in Labuan and she realises her father’s guilt as a war criminal. Meanwhile, the Sultan exposes Brooke’s biracial identity, disgracing him. Determined to redeem himself, Brooke proposes a mysterious plan to Marianne. Soon after, Sandokan is found dead in his cell.

programme.title: Sandokan: The Pirate Prince
programme.desc: Sandokan survives a fake poison, part of Brooke’s pact with Marianne: her hand for Sandokan’s freedom. Brooke hopes Sandokan will overthrow the Sultan, leaving room for him. Indeed, Sandokan returns to the jungle, leading the Dayaks’ to free the slaves. Brooke strikes a deal with Guillonk to suppress the revolt in exchange for becoming Rajah. When Marianne learns of this, she escapes and warns Sandokan. The Sultan is killed, Brooke rules Sarawak, but the Dayaks are free. Marianne and Sandokan begin a new life as revolutionaries on the hidden island of Mompracem.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess and the puppies find a pile of acorns buried under a tree. The puppies want to play with them, but Jess thinks they should find out why the acorns are buried there first. That's the Big Question! Baa and Billie don't know – Billie says she'd eat acorns rather than bury them! Jess goes off to see Mimi who's planting her conker to grow a chestnut tree. Jess wonders if someone planted the acorns to grown into an oak but Mimi doesn't think so. They'd need to be buried somewhere with more space to grow. Jess tries Willow who is storing apples for the winter. She explains that she'll eat the apples when food is scarce in the winter months. Jess wonders if someone is storing the acorns. He and the puppies go back to the tree and wait. Soon a Squirrel pops out from the tree and buries another acorn. Jess and the pups are glad they didn't play with the acorns. Squirrel's storing them for Winter. They've answered the question – yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Brown Bird sings a lovely song before leaving for winter migration. Jess would love to sound like Brown Bird – then they could listen to her song all year round. But how can he sound like her? That's the Big Question. Billie and Baa suggest Jess sings but his singing voice doesn't sound like Brown Bird at all. Mimi tries to mimic Brown Bird by whistling but that's not the right sound either. Maybe if Jess makes a hooty sound by blowing through his paws? That's still not the right sound. Jess tells his friends that it's more of a whistley sound – a bit like the wind whistling through the reeds at Horace's pond. So they go to the pond. Horace shows Jess how to blow through the reeds – and it sounds just like Brown Bird. They've found the Answer. Yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess and Horace want to play Boat Racing on the pond - but first the need work out how to make a boat! Some things are too heavy, some are too light… having tried lots of options and worked out that they need something light and boat shaped, they make Mimi's paper hats into boats for their boat race. Perfect!

programme.title: Guess with Jess

programme.title: Guess with Jess

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess and the puppies find a pile of acorns buried under a tree. The puppies want to play with them, but Jess thinks they should find out why the acorns are buried there first. That's the Big Question! Baa and Billie don't know – Billie says she'd eat acorns rather than bury them! Jess goes off to see Mimi who's planting her conker to grow a chestnut tree. Jess wonders if someone planted the acorns to grown into an oak but Mimi doesn't think so. They'd need to be buried somewhere with more space to grow. Jess tries Willow who is storing apples for the winter. She explains that she'll eat the apples when food is scarce in the winter months. Jess wonders if someone is storing the acorns. He and the puppies go back to the tree and wait. Soon a Squirrel pops out from the tree and buries another acorn. Jess and the pups are glad they didn't play with the acorns. Squirrel's storing them for Winter. They've answered the question – yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Brown Bird sings a lovely song before leaving for winter migration. Jess would love to sound like Brown Bird – then they could listen to her song all year round. But how can he sound like her? That's the Big Question. Billie and Baa suggest Jess sings but his singing voice doesn't sound like Brown Bird at all. Mimi tries to mimic Brown Bird by whistling but that's not the right sound either. Maybe if Jess makes a hooty sound by blowing through his paws? That's still not the right sound. Jess tells his friends that it's more of a whistley sound – a bit like the wind whistling through the reeds at Horace's pond. So they go to the pond. Horace shows Jess how to blow through the reeds – and it sounds just like Brown Bird. They've found the Answer. Yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess and Horace want to play Boat Racing on the pond - but first the need work out how to make a boat! Some things are too heavy, some are too light… having tried lots of options and worked out that they need something light and boat shaped, they make Mimi's paper hats into boats for their boat race. Perfect!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: It's Willow's apple picking party today, but some of the friends just are too chilly to go. Jess tries to work out how to keep them all warm, should they cover themselves in mud just like frogs do? Should they wrap themselves up in straw? Or might running around be the trick to getting them all toasty warm?

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess wants to introduce Willow to his new friend, Chloe the caterpillar. But where's Chloe gone? He searches for her in all the places she might be, where he's visited her before, where there might be juicey leaves she'd like to eat but it's not until a butterfly breaks out of a little Chloe-shaped-sack that Jess realises that Chloe's just changed!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess is playing puddle jumping, dodging the rain to have fun on a gloomy day when suddenly, just as the rain's stopping, the sun comes out and at the same time he sees a beautiful rainbow in the sky. He's desperate to show his friends, and it's not until he works out you need sunshine and rain at the same time to make a rainbow that he can show his friends the beautiful coloured shape in the sky.

programme.title: VR Fighter
programme.desc: Bodyguard Long Wei has post‐traumatic stress disorder after his wife's death. One day, he encounters Amy who works for a VR technology firm and is invited for a new product test. After the test, Long Wei becomes the firm’s VR fighter and dons the newly invented armour. However, as mysterious armed men break in, a fierce battle has just begun...

programme.title: Night Walk
programme.desc: Frank is framed for murder after his girlfriend is killed in a tragic incident during their visit to the Middle East. He is sent to a prison where he meets a Muslim inmate who helps him plan for a prison escape to prove his innocence. When his friend suddenly dies, can Frank successfully escape and seek justice for himself?

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: The Macaque Monkey
programme.desc: The world is in chaos after the tree of life was burnt. Sun Wu Kong decides to return to the past to resurrect it, but his divine power is unstable after losing the golden hoop, and he must find his younger self to team up to find the power of time. As the six-eared Macaque Monkey also wants the power of time, they clash in a fierce battle…

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.desc: Navy SEAL Rick is sentenced to rot in a military prison until he is offered the opportunity to put his life on the line and win his freedom in a kill or be killed reality show. Rick will have to eliminate some of the world's most notorious killers on live TV to gain his freedom and clear his name. Can he succeed finally?

programme.title: 1,000 Ways to Dine
programme.desc: Sometimes the best meals are kept locked behind closed doors, but in this episode host Michael Yo has the keys to some of the most special and secret dining spaces around.

programme.title: Oceanfront Property Hunt
programme.desc: Liz and Chris have both enjoyed living near the ocean and want to provide their three kids with the same experience. However, they have different opinions on how much to spend to make this dream a reality.

programme.title: Earth Sweepers

programme.title: Nuuk
programme.desc: Elaisa (Alice Dixson) is a Filipino widow who lives in Nuuk with her rebellious adult son Karl. She meets a visiting Filipino seaman Mark (Aga Muhlach). He is friendly and caring. But a blizzard is threatening to cause more havoc in her life.

programme.title: Darkroom
programme.desc: A group of teenage friends who seeks the thrill of ghost-hunting, and stumbles upon an old camera. As they carelessly play with it, they unknowingly summon the demon that exists inside.

programme.title: Revirginized
programme.desc: Carmela (Sharon Cuneta) gets to enjoy life again in a wild beach party. With young people and a hunk tattoo artist, she drowns herself in alcohol to forget her current self and renew her old self.

programme.title: Ben Delubyo
programme.desc: After his dismissal from the police force due to insubordination, Ben (Bong Revilla, Jr.) decides to lead a quiet life as a mechanic. But just as he is beginning to enjoy his new-found peace, his hometown is beleaguered by crimes. To help contain the problems before they are blown into unimaginable proportions, a PNP general orders a police lieutenant (Charlene Gonzales) to get him back. Indeed, he returns, but this time, as a vigilante. Ironically, his most important assignment is to collar a notorious drug lord (Ronaldo Valdez) who happens to be the father of his girlfriend (Aileen Damiles). Now, Ben is torn between protecting the woman he loves or upholding the law.

programme.title: Binhi
programme.desc: Daniel (Joem Bascon) and Cynthia (Mercedes Cabral), a young couple with a child on the way, head back to Baguio to start over again. Everything seems to be falling into place for them - or so they think - until strange things start to happen in their house.

programme.title: Who's That Girl?
programme.desc: A one-of-a-kind romantic-comedy movie about a girl who is an alleged mistress of a business tycoon, husband to Eugene Domingo's character,and father to Luis Manzano's character.

programme.title: Beks Days of Our Lives
programme.desc: Richardson (Chad Kinis), Reggie (Lassy Marquez) and Melvin (MC Calaquian) have have been friends for many years despite working in different fields. They decided to go on a vacation, finding themselves in hilarious situations. Everything's going perfectly well until the night Reggie collapses.

programme.title: Dibdiban Ang Laban
programme.desc: After earning her college degree, Marian (Anjanette Abayari) returns to her small, far-flung hometown to become a teacher for the poor. But one day, Marian is captured by rebels as a way to get back at her oppressive father.

programme.title: I'm Sorry My Love
programme.desc: In the hope of landing a job that will eventually enable her to pay for her sister’s operation, Tinay (Judy Ann Santos) leaves her small fishing village and heads for Manila.

programme.title: Coming Soon
programme.desc: The movie revolves around the misadventures of six friends who come from different status of life. Monica, Darwin, Sikyu, Sab, Dana and Nacho decided to live their lives young, wild and free despite their problems.

programme.title: Kuman Thong (Black Magic Baby)
programme.desc: The film is about a mother who loses her son in a tragedy and she wanted to bring him back. The mother resorts to a Kuman Thong statue, however things did not go as intended.

programme.title: Girlfriend Na Pwede Na
programme.desc: Pam (Kim Molina), having been dumped by her long-time boyfriend, hires Isko (Jerald Napoles), to pretend to be her new boyfriend so to make her ex jealous.

programme.title: Matalino Man Ang Matsing, Naiisahan Din!
programme.desc: Their personalities are as opposite as the two poles, and the worlds they respectively belong to be perpetually at odds. Gener (Eddie Garcia) is an accomplished policeman whose track record in solving crimes is exceptional, while Mando (Willie Revillame ) is a slick con man who has a knack at wearing disguises.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S5 E04 - How Slowly They Forget
programme.desc: With his dry-cleaning business booming, George Jefferson moves his family--level-headed wife Louise and son Lionel to the upper east side. But life in a luxurious Manhattan high-rise holds unexpected pitfalls for George.

programme.title: Frasier S3 E05 - Kisses Sweeter Than Wine
programme.desc: In the third season of FRASIER additions to the recurring cast include Marta, Maris' maid and go-between, Frasier's son, Frederick, and Kate Costas, the headstrong, ratings-obsessed new manager of Frasier's home radio station KACL.

programme.title: The Six Million Dollar Man S1 E04 - Wine, Women and War (Part II)
programme.desc: Lee Majors stars as Steve Austin, a U.S. astronaut who is critically injured upon re-entry, and whose damaged limbs are replaced with bionic, atomic-powered appendages. Now equipped with impressive capabilities, Austin uses his powers to fight for justice.

programme.title: Wonder Woman E06 - The Feminum Mystique: Part 2
programme.desc: Wonder Woman travels to America disguised as Diana Prince, assistant to Major Steve Trevor. Using her golden belt, bullet-deflecting bracelets, a golden lasso and an invisible supersonic plane, Wonder Woman combats evil.

programme.title: CSI S5 E24 - Grave Danger (Part 1)
programme.desc: Some provocative episodes from Season 5 of CSI involve Russian mail order brides ("Nesting Dolls"), infantism ("King Baby"), and the Mexican lifestyle of narcocorrido ("Snakes"). From the creative storytelling ("4x4") to the macabre ("Who Shot Sherlock?"), there’s something in Season 5 for everyone. The CSI team investigates many crimes that hit close to home as well. Grissom comes under fire from Ecklie ("Mea Culpa"), Brass tracks down his estranged daughter ("Hollywood Brass"), and during the course of the season Greg Sanders completes his transition from the lab to the field. Last, but not least, Season 5 wraps with an amazing two-part episode ("Grave Danger"), written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, where Nick comes face to face with death while the team exhausts all its resources to same him.

programme.title: Mission Impossible S4 E23 - The Crane
programme.desc: Smart, stylish and suspenseful, MISSION: IMPOSSIBLE returns for its dynamic 4th season, captivating audiences with its glimpse into the world of international espionage.

programme.title: Dark Marvels
programme.desc: The gates are open to some of history's most sinister structures. From the terrifying Tower of London to a hotel of horrors, discover the dark secrets hidden within these foreboding fortresses.

programme.title: Hazardous History With Henry Winkler (S1)
programme.desc: Snack on a feast of food horrors from the past: from radioactive energy drinks to scandalous snacks made with Olestra, we uncover the incredible things people once ate without a second thought.

programme.title: Alone (S10)
programme.desc: A shift in weather tests the strength of the survivalists' shelters as well as their resolve. Unable to exit their shelters, one survivalist carves out ways to pass the time as another struggles to cope.

programme.title: Mountain Men (S12)
programme.desc: Jake spends the night in the mountains after his snowmobile breaks down. Paul traps for mink and pine marten. Eustace helps a friend buy and assemble an antique sawmill.

programme.title: History's Greatest Escapes With Morgan Freeman (S2)
programme.desc: During the Civil War, a daring prison break frees hundreds of Union soldiers. When he was captured and sent to Libby Prison in Richmond, Virginia, he engineered one of the greatest mass escapes in history.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S4)
programme.desc: In 1930, a New York Supreme Court justice with close ties to Tammany Hall, and future president Franklin Delano Roosevelt, steps out of a steakhouse and disappears.

programme.title: Forged In Fire (S10)
programme.desc: In this special competition, two previous champions go head-to-head in a 5-hour forging round, making their own signature 'can mai' blades for the chance to compete against one of our titans of the forge.

programme.desc: It is an ancient city, said to be overflowing with gold. Explorers put their lives on the line searching for it. As the endless quest to uncover this infamous city continues, will anyone ever find it?

programme.title: The Maggie Dela Riva Story
programme.desc: Maggie Dela Riva was a popular young actress in 1969 when she was abducted and raped by four men from rich, influential families. Concerned about the rising number of crimes against women, Maggie came out of retirement to once more tell her story.

programme.title: Ulo Ng Gang-Ho
programme.desc: The life story of Viyong, a notorious police from Balic-Balic, Samaloc.

programme.title: Magtago Ka Na Sa Pinanggalingan Mo
programme.desc: Magtago Ka Na Sa Pinanggalingan Mo

programme.title: Sugo
programme.desc: Dan (Mark Gil) is languishing in jail for a crime he did not commit. He is accused of murdering his girlfriend.

programme.title: Ipagpatawad Mo
programme.desc: They were the ideal couple and seemed to lead the perfect life. But their son was not like the other normal children. How they came to terms with the presence of their autistic child in their lives, is the gist of this wonderfully crafted film.

programme.title: Simaron
programme.desc: As a martial arts expert, a graduate of the Police Academy of America and the son of a retired general, Cris could have had all the privileges possible for a career in the armed forces. However, like many of the heroes he had idolized since childhood, he chosed to go undercover.

programme.title: Ang Pumatay Ng Dahil Sa'yo
programme.desc: Sergeant Emilio Sanchez is a dedicated military man. He believes that Filipinos should stand on their own and not be taken by the Americans.

programme.title: Pintsik Haik
programme.desc: As a head of a small time general services, business and some illegal activity, Mando is satisfied enough on what they earned and share some blessings to the charity. But one day he was hired to rescue the father of May-leng.

programme.title: Kung Kailangan Mo Ako
programme.desc: The cranky and ill-natured Sharon Cuneta was the vital witness in a celebrated case and the guilty parties would do anything to put her away. While she had been trying to flee from her pursuers in a cab driven by Rudy Fernandez, they got into an accident, which made her lose her memory.

programme.title: Working Boys
programme.desc: The wacky trio of Tito, Vic & Joey became a quartet with the addition of Bagets star, Herbert Bautista. They played jacks-of-all-trades and masters of none in this take-off from the acclaimed Working Girls.

programme.title: Batangueño Kabitenyo
programme.desc: This is a story of Magno,who is from Batangas and has the ability to attract women like flies.He goes to Manila hoping to change.

programme.title: SPO4 Santiago (Sharpshooter)
programme.desc: Bong Revilla, Jr, starred in this exciting film based on the real-life exploits of SPO4 Jimmy Santiago, SWAT member and sharp-shooter, who was idolized by the masses because he relentlessly went after hostage takers, hold-uppers and all sorts of criminals.

programme.title: Kapag Iginuhit Ang Hatol Ng Puso
programme.desc: An intriguing drama about criss-crossed relationships. The people who were loving, using and losing each other.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: GRAND SUMO Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from January 22, Day 12 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Today's Close-Up
programme.desc: Dig deeper into current affairs. Cutting-edge information and critical analysis on important issues confronting Japanese lives.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Nagasaka Mago makes art with discarded smartphones, computers, and other e-waste from the slums of Ghana, then uses much of the proceeds to give back to the community. He talks about his vision.

programme.title: Passing the Torch of Peace
programme.desc: A Hiroshima teen and an atomic bomb survivor try to depict visually what one mother endured immediately after the blast - her agony, sacrifice, and love - so that her tragic story is not repeated.

programme.title: A Culture Built with Wood Kiso
programme.desc: The Kiso region in Nagano Prefecture is covered by coniferous forests that have been tended by human hands over generations. Join us as we savor the rich culture they've shaped.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: Will Sparks Fly?
programme.desc: A dapper young man sits in a teahouse with his older companion when a young woman catches his eye. From the way they're looking at each other, it's clear that there's something going on between them.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: Kiriake Chieko helped cremate schoolmates after the atomic bombing in Hiroshima. At 95, as the oldest surviving witness, she continues to give her testimony, urging people to hold on dearly to peace.

programme.title: Satoyama Kitchen Fall #8

programme.desc: Mickey puts herself in danger while following up on the Dock lead. Mickey brings Thomas and Truman to her family’s Thanksgiving and Paula's reaction to a new piece of evidence makes Mickey question everything.

programme.title: ELSBETH (SEASON 1)
programme.desc: When the world’s top tennis champion drops dead on the court, Elsbeth and Kaya hone in on a rising tennis star and his competitive father and coach.

programme.title: DOC (SEASON 2)
programme.desc: A patient forces Amy to confront the realities of medical tourism, TJ helps a veteran with his prosthetic and Joan drops a bombshell.

programme.title: FBI: INTERNATIONAL (SEASON 3)
programme.desc: " When ex-FBI agent Bill Cormack (guest star Jeffrey Pierce), captured by hostile forces in Libya years ago, suddenly resurfaces in a brutal Tripoli prison, Forrester and Powell risk everything to go undercover as prisoners to break him out.

programme.title: ROOKIE BLUE (SEASON 5)
programme.desc: 15 Division is assigned to a community outreach program, "Moving Day", to help tenants move out of a subsidized-housing complex that's being torn down.

programme.title: S.W.A.T. (SEASON 7)
programme.desc: When a crew of violent eco-terrorists abducts the teenage son of an energy company executive, SWAT must untangle the kidnappers' twisted motives before carrying out a high-stakes rescue mission.

programme.title: FBI (SEASON 6)
programme.desc: After an employee of the U.S. Army is shot in an industrial park, the team works to track down the killer who reveals a larger plot at play. Meanwhile, Tiffany continues to struggle with the guilt surrounding Hobbs' death.

programme.title: ZOMBIELAND: DOUBLE TAP
programme.desc: Through comic mayhem from the White House to the heartland, four slayers face off against new kinds of evolved zombies and new human survivors.

programme.title: The World - Episode 12
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from ABC News correspondents as well as interviews with experts and guests.

programme.title: Landline - Episode 32
programme.desc: We bring you more of our favourite Landline stories from 2025: Imitating the effects of lightning to supercharge plant growth, and one man's mission to solve the power problems of a small Western Australian town.

programme.title: New Leash On Life - Memphis
programme.desc: Terrified Memphis faces being euthanised unless the right foster carer can be found. No one can get close to this seemingly aggressive hound except Derek. Can Laura and Joel win Memphis' trust and find Memphis a new home?

programme.title: Ambulance Australia - Episode 7
programme.desc: Ambulance Australia follows the state's Ambulance Services from the Triple Zero Control Centres to paramedics on the road.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - My Garden Path - Millie Ross
programme.desc: We head down the garden path with Millie Ross to learn how a lifetime connecting with the natural landscape has inspired a career in horticulture, and a creative approach to gardening.

programme.title: Better Date Than Never - Episode 4
programme.desc: Allycia gets ready for her first ever date, hoping to meet True Love's Prince. Kento is thrilled to make a connection with someone new. Charles maximises his chances of finding love by attending a speed dating event.

programme.title: First Generation - Episode 3
programme.desc: First Generation follows nine inspiring people from the Asia-Pacific who built new lives and forged their own path. Their stories celebrate ambition, belonging, and the diverse spirit that defines modern Australia.

programme.title: Off Country - Episode 3
programme.desc: Students face the ups and downs of remote learning after COVID-19 shuts the school down; Tahlia appreciates being closer to her family in Darwin; Sunny feels more pressure about his Year 12 exams.

programme.title: Common Cause - After the Wave - Tonga
programme.desc: After the 2022 volcanic eruption and tsunami destroyed Tonga's main port, Australian and Tongan engineers joined forces to rebuild this vital lifeline. Along the way, one engineer finds her true calling.

programme.title: The World - Episode 12
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from ABC News correspondents as well as interviews with experts and guests.

programme.title: 7.30 - Episode 12
programme.desc: David Speers presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account.

programme.title: News Breakfast - Episode 17
programme.desc: As the day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. James Glenday and Emma Rebellato bring you the latest news, interviews and today's top stories, plus Catherine Murphy with sport and Stephanie Ferrier with weather.

programme.title: News Breakfast - Episode 17
programme.desc: As each day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday present the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 17
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Melissa Mackay.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 17
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - Autumn: Indoor Stunners & Bruny Island
programme.desc: Costa finds a green-walled rental; Hannah visits Bruny Island; Millie plants winter seeds; Josh explores a tropical oasis; Tammy preserves flowers; Jerry busts myths about natives; Sophie profiles tough Mediterranean plants.

programme.title: The Great Australian Bake Off - Episode 7
programme.desc: Twelve home bakers take part in a bake-off to test their baking skills as they battled to be crowned The Great Australian Bake Off's best amateur baker.

programme.title: Great Australian Road Trips - Episode 4
programme.desc: Four high-profile Australian stars embark on an epic road trip across the country's most iconic landscapes, one unforgettable pit-stop at a time. With Melissa Leong, Nazeem Hussain, Claudia Karvan and Steph Tisdell.

programme.title: Roads Unknown India - Episode 3
programme.desc: Jess sets off for Palakkad, exporing the region's lush tea plantations and local tribal villages. As the crew heads into Karnataka, they visit a stunning waterfall and gain more riders along the way.

programme.title: Common Cause - Changing the Game - Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Nihlar's life was like everyone else's until she discovered her passion for cricket through an Australian-backed effort to foster social cohesion and empower girls in Sri Lanka's North, still healing from decades of conflict.

programme.title: Landline: Mekong Special - Cambodia and Laos

programme.desc: Drama clubs from an all-boys and all-girls high school hold a joint training camp. A series of horrific and ususual events soon take place at the camp and the students learn that an old mountain legend creature, Dorome, is responsible.

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Open the Coffin
programme.desc: Ghost Hand and his tomb raiders resurface in Jiang City to seek gold in ancient tombs after a 3-year absence. They released an evil spirit from a coffin and all four died at home eventually. Poison and pinholes in the corpses become the sole clue for police investigation. A tomb raid now unfolds as a perplexing and mysterious case.

programme.title: Red Rain
programme.desc: Based on true events, a young scientist who specialises in the study of aliens and extraterrestrials sets out to uncover the mystery behind a series of strange occurrences in Kerala.

programme.title: The Fox Demon Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a story in the novel “Strange Tales from Liaozhai”, a young student in the late Ming Dynasty meets a charming fox demon and they soon fall in love. Though they encounter several obstacles due to their different nature, the lovers continue to fight against fate. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: Dorome Boys version
programme.desc: Drama clubs from an all-boys and all-girls high school hold a joint training camp. A series of horrific and ususual events soon take place at the camp and the students learn that an old mountain legend creature, Dorome, is responsible.

programme.title: Dorome Boys version
programme.desc: Drama clubs from an all-boys and all-girls high school hold a joint training camp. A series of horrific and ususual events soon take place at the camp and the students learn that an old mountain legend creature, Dorome, is responsible.

programme.title: Mama Ghost
programme.desc: In a coastal town, a forbidden romance sparks between Rico and Sisca, and their love unleashes a malevolent spirit. As chilling deaths plague the town, past secrets are being unraveled and the town is possessed by evil and fear. Rico must defy destiny and fight against the evil spirit to save his loved one.

programme.title: Dead in the Water
programme.desc: When aspiring photography vlogger Tara gets dumped by her long term boyfriend, her best friend Amy takes her on a weekend getaway to her family's vacation lake house. It is there that they encounter a mysterious and charming man who forces them to face their demons.

programme.title: Never Leave
programme.desc: Strange incidents keep happening in Lin Yue's house after a car accident: her sister cannot see the images of her family members in the mirror; her father is peeping at night; and there is the sound of marbles from the attic every day at dawn. Following the sound to the attic, Lin Yue finds her own death portrait as she opens the door...

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6)
programme.desc: Kim Edwards and Lucas Markham were both outsiders from troubled homes. They felt they understood each other when no one else did. Together they made a plan to get rid of the mum and sister Kim resented.

programme.title: Lie Detector: Truth Or Deception
programme.desc: Jesse Holton sits down for a high-stakes polygraph test with retired FBI examiner George Olivo. In 2016, Jesse became a suspect after a dispute with his parents ended in their brutal deaths.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Heartbreaking accounts of families torn apart by crime. Ashley Wallace, who was almost killed by her own mother, Jenny Carrieri, whose search for her sister's murderer consumed her life.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S2)
programme.desc: When a 25-year-old college student vanishes on Christmas Eve, investigators must piece together the details of a first date gone tragically wrong.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: In December 1985, when human bones are discovered in the woods, it puts an end to the search for missing teen David Reed. David's disappearance shook a small town, and skull fractures point to murder.

programme.title: City Confidential (S8)
programme.desc: Historical Bucks County, is alarmed when several young men vanish one after the other within a week. Detectives unearth a ruthless murder spree in this seemingly picture-perfect farming community.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: DNA Speaks
programme.desc: When teens Llianna Adank and Eric Goldstrand are found shot to death at an Oregon park in 1977, every parent's nightmare comes true.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S2)
programme.desc: In Virginia Beach, one man is struggling to feed his kids while another is surprised to find he owes child support. A woman is indignant to learn she's been arrested for getting drunk in a bar.

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6)
programme.desc: Kim Edwards and Lucas Markham were both outsiders from troubled homes. They felt they understood each other when no one else did. Together they made a plan to get rid of the mum and sister Kim resented.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S2)
programme.desc: A Florida mother vanishes into the night after celebrating her daughter's first birthday. In their search to find her, the police seek answers from the father of her child.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: DNA Speaks
programme.desc: When teens Llianna Adank and Eric Goldstrand are found shot to death at an Oregon park in 1977, every parent's nightmare comes true.

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6)
programme.desc: Kim Edwards and Lucas Markham were both outsiders from troubled homes. They felt they understood each other when no one else did. Together they made a plan to get rid of the mum and sister Kim resented.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: In July of 1970, the brutal murder of single mom Loretta Jones leaves four-year-old Heidi Jones motherless. Nearly 40 years later, Heidi vows to solve her mother's cold case.

programme.title: Murder At The Motel
programme.desc: January 5, 2016, Baltimore, MD. Police officers respond to a report of a deceased man found at the Deluxe Plaza Motel in Northeast Baltimore.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Murder In The Bayou
programme.desc: When a young mother, Selonia Reed, 26, is found brutally murdered in her car, detectives turn over every rock in small-town Hammond, Louisiana, in search of her killer.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A local trip becomes a harrowing ordeal for one family when they're surrounded by an angry mob that attacks their vehicle; a laundromat owner is beaten by unruly patrons from the business next door.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A typical Sunday morphs into a violent gunfight when two armed men invade a family's home; an unsuspecting impound lot worker checks out a disturbance and is nearly mowed down by an irate woman.

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6)
programme.desc: Dubbed 'the vampire killer,' teen Mathew Hardman thought that taking a life would make him immortal. His victim was an elderly neighbour. After stabbing her, he removed her heart and drank her blood.

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: An undercover NYPD officer and an ATF special agent learn firsthand not to trust a suspect's demeanour, regardless of how amicable it may appear.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: Tara Grinstead's sudden disappearance goes unexplained for 11 years until a surprising statement to law enforcement from Bo Dukes, a former student, names his friend and former classmate as her killer.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: After rideshare driver Carolina Vargas drove a nice stranger to his hotel, she didn't have qualms about giving him another ride. But her trusting gesture turned tragic.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: Arthur Shawcross tells a lot of stories about his life before he began to kill. He might have been known for killing women along Rochester's Genesee River, but his first murder was years earlier.

programme.title: Grade 10 Science
programme.desc: Learn about the feedback mechanisms of organisms and how it helps them maintain homeostasis. Discover how information is stored in DNA, how changes in its molecule affect its products as mutations, and how evolution through natural selection can result in biodiversity, whose influence can affect the stability of ecosystems.

programme.title: ALS
programme.desc: Learn about the process of planning, setting up, running a small business, and entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Grade 5 Filipino
programme.desc: Alamin ang wastong pagamit ng mga pang-abay, pang-uri, pang-angkop, pangatnig, salitang naglalarawan. Aralin kung paano magsulat ng pangungusap, talata, at balita, at kung paano magsuri ng mga kuwento at mga pahayag.

programme.title: Grade 5 Math
programme.desc: Discover what are percents, polygons, circles, solid figures, sequences, time, circumference, and how to solve simple equations.

programme.title: Grade 5 English
programme.desc: Differentiate the various text-types and know how to summarize them, as well as how to make a stand and provide evidences supporting opinions or facts.

programme.title: Grade 5 Science
programme.desc: Learn more about motion in terms of distance and time, alongside how objects and people interact and are affected by light, sound, and heat, and electricity. Discover the relationship of electricity and magnetism in electromagnets, and what simple DC circuits are.

programme.title: Preschool | Eccd
programme.desc: Learn about the concept of size, length, weight, time, and money. Study how children can take care of themselves and understand the objects in the environment and their attributes.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: Learn about the concept of size, length, weight, time, and money. Study how children can take care of themselves and understand the objects in the environment and their attributes.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: Know more about fractions 1⁄2 and 1/4, 2-dimensional and 3-dimensional figures, as well as continuous and repeating patterns and mathematical sentences.

programme.title: Grade 1 Reading & Literacy
programme.desc: Learn about polite expressions and how to talk about oneself, one’s family and one’s personal experiences.

programme.title: Grade 1 Makabansa
programme.desc: Unawain ang kahalagahan ng pagkilala ng mga batayang impormasyon ng pisikal na kapaligiran sa sariling paaralan at ng mga taong bumubuo rito para sa paghubog ng kakayahan ng bawat mag-aaral.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Matuto tungkol sa pangngalan, panghalip, salitang magkatugma, salitang naglalarawan, at pagbabaybay, pati na rin ang iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento at ang pag-uugnay ng sarili sa tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: Study how to divide whole numbers up to 1000 including money and unit fractions. Learn more about straight and curved lines, flat and curved surfaces, and basic shapes and continuous patterns using two attributes.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: Discover what are word clines, synonyms, and antonyms. Identify major points and key themes in a story, and the difference between what is made-up and real in texts.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Panlipunan

programme.desc: Identify which fractions are proper and improper, similar and dissimilar and equivalent. Learn more about lines and symmetrical designs, continuous and repeating patterns, and mathematical sentences involving multiplication and division of whole numbers.

programme.desc: Study what are homonyms, homographs, and hyponyms. Know more about the elements of a story, how to write it, and how to compare and contrast its information, alongside learning about words, phrases, and sentences with long vowels.

programme.desc: Alamin kung paano magsuri at maghambing ng iba't ibang uri ng panitikan, kung ano ang mga estratehiya sa pagkuha ng impormasyon, paano wastong gamitin ang impormal na komunikasyon, at ang angkop na ekspresyon sa pagbabahagi ng ideya o opinyon tungkol sa mga tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 8 Math
programme.desc: Identify the key concepts of axiomatic structure of geometry and triangle congruence.

programme.title: Grade 8 English
programme.desc: Examine what are biases, propagandas, parallelism, and cohesive devices in different types of speech.

programme.title: Grade 8 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Aralin ang naging transpormasyon tungo sa makabagong panahon ng mga bansa at rehiyon sa daigdig bunsod ng paglaganap ng mga kaisipan sa agham, politika, at ekonomiya tungo sa pagbuo ng pandaigdigan kamalayan.

programme.title: Grade 8 Science
programme.desc: Learn more about the particle nature of matter as a basis for explaining properties, physical changes, and structure of substances and mixtures. Discover how to identify a substance according to its atomic structure, and how to use the periodic table of elements to organize and determine the chemical properties of elements.

programme.title: Viva Maria !
programme.desc: In a fictional South American country in 1907, after the death of her father, an Irish terrorist, Maria joins a travelling music-hall show which offers her a place as a Parisian duettist. Her partner has the same first name as her. Together, they find themselves embroiled in a peasants' revolt.

programme.title: Au Revoir Jérôme !
programme.desc: Newly arrived in heaven, Jérôme sets off in search of his wife. He gradually finds himself falling ever-deeper into a colourful but totally surrealist world where no-one seems able to help him.

programme.title: 64' Actu
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What you need to know: the Francophone view of the day's main events. Economics, social debates, international news: the expertise of our journalists. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: 64' Débat
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What it's all about: the guests take an in-depth look at a key issue. Increased focus on Francophone cultural news, with dedicated sequences. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: Enquêtes De Région
programme.desc: Travels to discover the regions of France. Through these territories, the investigations come as close as possible to the issues of today's society.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Maghreb-Orient Express
programme.desc: What's new in the Arab worlds? Journalist Mohamed Kaci hosts those making the cultural headlines in Tunis, Algiers, Rabat, Beirut, Alexandria, Dubai...

programme.title: Comment Ça Va Le Nord ?
programme.desc: The rapid growth of shrubs and plants in areas where there used to be very little or even no vegetation raises questions. What are the effects on biodiversity, the landscape and the population? What can be expected in the long term?

programme.title: Le Journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: L'Actu
programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: C Dans L'Air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Paname
programme.desc: Yvan Hallouin walks around Paris and its surroundings. In each stroll, the soul and identity of the 'City of Light' are examined through encounters with the local inhabitants and historical anecdotes.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: 100 % Pur Poils
programme.desc: On the seafront in Le Grau-du-Roi, the Seaquarium is much more than just an aquarium. A place for research and the preservation of Mediterranean species, it is also a place for sharing with young people, to raise awareness of the fragility of the marine environment.

programme.title: L'Épicerie
programme.desc: The place to be for all those who are interested in what they put on their plates and all things relating to food. The programme: reports, surveys, taste tests, test benches, answers to questions from television viewers, including advice and simple but effective tricks.

programme.title: Comment Ça Va Le Nord ?
programme.desc: The rapid growth of shrubs and plants in areas where there used to be very little or even no vegetation raises questions. What are the effects on biodiversity, the landscape and the population? What can be expected in the long term?

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Télévisions editorial team.

programme.title: Télématin
